thread.title: Lynx VR Trainer reviewed by Phil
thread.title_full: Lynx VR Trainer reviewed by Phil

author: Phil
title: Lynx VR Trainer reviewed by Phil
text:
I was a little reluctant to give veloreality a go because everybody kept on about other turbo-trainer software but as I'm a) Old and b)Crocked at the moment I can't ride outside at present.
I'm a bit grumpy at the best of times but have found these videos to be of excellent quality and the customer service outstanding. I have no idea how big this company is but it felt like a one-to-one customer experience; a real treat not to get an Asian call centre or a bot.
In summary, if turbo training bores you give this lot a go - the software and the demo are free too.
